ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, Brad has stated in the past that the Fiery Avenger is given as the result of a high level Paladin quest, rather than as the loot of a particular
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, Brad has stated in the past that the Fiery Avenger is given as the
result of a high level Paladin quest, rather than as the loot of a
particular monster.

-- Broden McFhï¿½el
Barbarian Shaman
Safe Haven Guild
Bristlebane Server
